It grows mold it gets old but it never gets boring. I recommend this game because every round is different. I suggest you buy Prime Status ($15) so you can minimize your chance of getting a cheater. Here's some tips, if you want to have a good trust factor do these things. First don't be a dick and get reported, Second be more active in the community, Third Don't play with cheaters (if you can), Fourth don't cheat obviously.

Overall this game is fun and it takes actual skills to get gud
